sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Dashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}'); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token'); localStorage.removeItem('user'); window.location.href = '/login'; }; const getDashboardContent = () => { switch (user.role) { // Update the student case in Dashboard.js: case 'student': return (

Student Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}! You can monitor classes and rate lectures here.

Monitoring

View class reports and attendance records

Rating

Rate lectures and provide feedback to lecturers

{/* Quick Stats */}
Quick Access
); // In the lecturer case section, update the buttons: case 'lecturer': return (

Lecturer Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}! Manage your classes and reports.

Classes

Manage your classes

Reports

Submit teaching reports

Monitoring

Monitor student attendance

Rating

View your ratings

{/* Quick Stats */}
Quick Actions
); // Update the principal_lecturer case in Dashboard.js: case 'principal_lecturer': return (

Principal Lecturer Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}! Oversee courses and provide feedback in the {user.faculty} stream.

Courses

View all courses & lectures under your stream

Reports

View lecture reports & add feedback

Monitoring

Monitor academic performance

Rating

View ratings and feedback

{/* Quick Actions */}
Quick Actions
); // Update the program_leader case in Dashboard.js: case 'program_leader': return (

Program Leader Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}! Manage programs, courses, and lecturer assignments.

Courses

Add courses & assign lecture modules

Reports

View reports from PRL

Lecturers

Manage lecturer assignments

Classes

Manage class structures

{/* Quick Actions */}
Quick Actions
); default: return

Loading...

; } }; return (

LUCT Reporting System

Welcome, {user.name} ({user.role})
{getDashboardContent()}
); }; export default Dashboard;
